attributes.action: make a public statement of the conditions which need to be fulfilled to secure the withdrawal of British forces from Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our forces are taking heavy casualties in Afghanistan without any clearly defined or achievable goals. Both they and the British people deserve to know what needs to happen before they can be withdrawn - unless we intend to stay there indefinitely. What is "victory" in Afghanistan - and who decides when it has been achieved?

rejection.details: The Government regularly makes statements about Afghanistan. You can read more at: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20961
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
